verbs.description: Several governors across the country [V: are] canceling the deployment of their National Guard troops near the US - Mexico border in response to the Trump administration 's practice of separating immigrant families .

[ARG0: Several governors across the country] are [V: canceling] [ARG1: the deployment of their National Guard troops near the US - Mexico border] [ARGM-PRP: in response to the Trump administration 's] [ARGM-CAU: practice of separating immigrant families] .

Several governors across the country are canceling the deployment of their National Guard troops near the US - Mexico border in response to the Trump administration 's practice of [V: separating] [ARG1: immigrant families] .
